original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, If a soul shall sin through ignorance against any of the commandments of the Lord concerning things which ought not to be done, and shall do against any of them:
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 누구든지 여호와의 계명 중 하나라도 그릇 범하였으되

sentences.original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel
If a soul shall sin through ignorance
against any of the commandments of the Lord
concerning things which ought not to be done
and shall do against any of them
